comment_text:
> Internet Explorer 1 (rebranded Mosaic)

Keep in mind that this wasn't the original NCSA Mosaic

"Spyglass, Inc. licensed the technology and trademarks from NCSA for producing their own web browser but never used any of the NCSA Mosaic source code. Microsoft licensed Spyglass Mosaic in 1995 for US$2 million, modified it, and renamed it Internet Explorer."

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mosaic_(web_browser)
author: bdcravens
story_title: Microsoft nixes ActiveX add-on technology in new Edge browser
